_meta.source: Researched from Dunedin NZ tourism and cruise port guides

bbox_hint.note: Covers Port Chalmers, Dunedin city, Otago Peninsula

transit_routes.name: Shuttle to Dunedin
transit_routes.note: Regular shuttles from Port Chalmers to city center.

transit_routes.name: Taxi to Otago Peninsula
transit_routes.note: For Royal Albatross Centre and wildlife tours.

featured_experiences.name: Otago Peninsula Wildlife
featured_experiences.note: World's only mainland albatross colony. Penguin viewing at dusk.

featured_experiences.name: Larnach Castle
featured_experiences.note: Built 1871 by banker William Larnach. Beautiful gardens.

featured_experiences.name: Dunedin City Heritage
featured_experiences.note: Scotland meets New Zealand in this well-preserved Victorian city.
